text: Quentin Oliver Lee (January 28, 1988 â€“ December 1, 2022) was an American actor and operatic baritone. He is known for having worked on stage productions such as The Phantom of the Opera and Caroline or Change. Lee died of colon cancer on December 1, 2022.
